search_03_002/4301_0101_0100_10:
Blasted Team Break thugs...wreaking havoc
everywhere you go while the young master’s
trying to run a tournament!
search_03_002/4301_0101_0200_10:
I knew there’d be more of them slinking around...
And look, here they are. Surprise, surprise.
search_03_002/4301_0101_0300_10:
Whoa! Check this guy out...
Hey, muscle man! You and your pretty girlfriend
over there need to scram! This is our turf!
search_03_002/4301_0101_0400_10:
Who do you think you’re talking to?
Master Lear handpicked the two of us to
crack down on troublemaking misfits like you!
search_03_002/4301_0101_0500_10:
Yo! You guys take care o’ the big guy and
the girl! Leave this bunch o’ losers to me.
search_03_002/4301_0501_0100_10:
Arrgh! We gotta scram for now, boys!
Let’s go!
search_03_002/4301_0501_0200_10:
Ugh, fiiinally. I thought that would never end.
Come on. Let’s hurry up and report back to
Master Lear.
search_03_002/4301_0501_0300_10:
Not yet. We need to continue making our
rounds. Team Break have probably scattered
all over this island.
search_03_002/4301_0501_0400_10:
Did you hear that, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Sounds like we need your help for a
li’l bit longer...
